R.G.: Multilinear Algebra

21 October 2019
Question 1: why we talk about multilinear algebra ?

why we talk about multilinear space, if we equip the spacetime with a vector space, what does 5*paris mean?
It means nothing.
The reason why we talk about multilinear space is because the tangent spaces.

Question 2: why study vector space?

the benificial is following:

  1. for constuction of , one needs an intermediate vector space
  2. tensor technique are most easily understoodin in an abstract setting.
definition: vector space

a vector space is a set V with two operations, plus and times
1): a set V
2): +: V*V V “addition”

vector space of Homomorphisms

if and are vector spaces, then we can define the set all linear maps from one to another:
into a bag
It’s actually just a set, and the set has a name, and the name is
This just a set, of all linear maps.
Furthermore, we can make this set Hom(V,W) becomes a vector space by add structure
such as addition and multiplication.
so is also a vector space.

terminology: dual vector space

dual vector space just a heavily used special case.

suppose is a vector space.

real numbers are also vector space, so this is just another set Hom(V,R), and it is a special set
V and just the most basic building blocks to build very complicat case. It’s clever to bring something down to its elementry building blocks, that’s the only idea.
define on Hom(V,R) is also a vector space.
It has a speical name, it’s called dual vector space to V.

Example

consider: which means
def
so is a covector

covector

element are called covector.

tensor

let be a vector space, An (r,s)-tensor T over V is a multilinear map:


That’s the logic we say V and just the most basic building blocks.

So what does multilinear mean?

  1. T(1,1)-tensor





Example 1: polyinomial



is a (0,2)-tensor over P.

Example 2: Vectors and covectors as tensors


inner product is a (0,2)-tensor
You know so many tensors, but maybe you never call them tensors.

Remark

remark

Compared with linear algebar on vector space, Multilinear Algebra is the same field, emphasis just not only look at the linear maps, but multilinear maps.
